short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and access your important AI Conversations easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatMarks is a Chrome extension focused on bookmarking essential conversations from AI models like Gemini, GPT, Claude, and Mistral with small descriptions for quick access.
